document_data.mainbody:
laheerta was an inhabitant of the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Flaheerta was a half-elven woman with skin the hue of wood and bronze. She had light hazel eyes and dark brown hair gathered in a bun. She wore red wizardly robes.
In the , Flaheerta could be found in the docks of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate, where commoners could buy fresh fish. The docks were attacked by a band of sahuagin when the area was visited by the Absolute Adversaries, if was unknown if Flaheerta survived the attack.
